Name: Tom Arnold
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare lemon slice wheel for garnish.
Review: Traditional lemonade laced with vodka and lengthened with tea to make a light and refreshing drink.
History: This is one of a series of tea-based drinks that were originally named after golfers. It takes its name from the actor and comedian who starred in National Lampoon's Golf Punk .
Nutrition: One serving of Tom Arnold contains 180 calories
